title: Garlicky Kale & Pea Saut√©
directions: In 5- to 6-quart saucepot on medium, cook garlic and chile in oil 2 minutes, stirring often. Add kale, sugar and 1/2 teaspoon salt. Cook 6 minutes or until kale is tender, stirring occasionally.Stir in peas. Cook 2 minutes or until heated through.
ingredients: 2 bunches kale, trimmed and chopped (about 1 lb. total)
